name: Central Reservations
description: Main developer behind this wordpress powered website. Everything was designed from the ground up with a custom plugin that interfaces with the barefoot web api to obtain available properties and sell them.
alt: Central Reservation's main page by web developer Ryan Videlock

name: Nocturnal Design
description: A dark themed custom designed website in a completely custom CMS made specifically for this client. Unique in that it was one of the first websites I put out and the customer enjoyed the custom designs I put in.
alt: The home page for Nocturna Design by web developer Ryan Videlock

name: Dynatex International
description: Custom video and a custom CMS built entirely for their product catalogue.
alt: Dynatex International's home page by web developer Ryan Videlock

name: Embajador Tequila
description: A fun project that let me explore new design opportunities. Custom menu, custom CMS,
alt: The main site for Embajador Tequila by web developer Ryan Videlock

name: The Fitness Connection
description: Half Wordpress and half Magento build, with a wordpress theme built from the ground up to use a completely different architecture from a typical Wordpress build.
alt: The Fitness Connection's front page by web developer Ryan Videlock

name: Monte Carlo Oceanfront
description: A single page parallax wordpress website. Heavily customised wordpress install using a prebuilt wordpress theme.
alt: Front page design for Monte Carlo Oceanfront by web developer Ryan Videlock

name: CoxReels
description: Completely custom CMS, with a completely custom search tool that used a series of regex and mysql commands to find the correct reels for the end user. My last, biggest and most fun project to work on at BX3. It used a bunch of new css and js techniques for the time and was very well designed.
alt: CoxReels front page by web developer Ryan Videlock

name: Sellers & Associates
description: A realty site built on top of a custom CMS that uses a completely custom search engine to search through the properties.
alt: The home page of Sellers & Associates by web developer Ryan Videlock
